A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Really good movie\, but with several flaws.  
The biggest flaw is the run time\, while I wouldn't say any part bored me\, some of it could've been cut (like the entire Monaco planet stuff) to make a more cohesive movie.  Another thing that bothered me was that we don't get any background info on Snoke\, he seems to be quite old and powerful\, so where was he in the first 6 episodes? Also\, some of the effects were poor\, especially in the creature department. The other flaws are things that can't be discussed unless you've seen the movie.  
There is a lot of good:  fantastic action scenes\, good acting (in a Star Wars movie?!?)\, some big laughs (actually\, an early gag was almost too funny for a SW movie)\, and some interesting interplay between characters.  
As per usual\, even though I spent more time complaining about it\, I really did enjoy this.  I think it'll rank right below Return of the Jedi for me.
